text: Gripe: `@which Diagonal(1:3)` links to a local file instead of GitHub, as it used to do

elements.text: links to a local file instead of GitHub, as it used to do

text:
i worked out how to fix this for Julia 1.0 including for packages. But the code was terrifying.
Now that we have better pkg introspection tools that should be much cleaner.

The PR was never merged, or possibly I never made the actual PR just one for supporting tooling, which now has been eclipsed.

Anyway, we can totally make that work again

elements.text: instead of GitHub, as it used to do

text:
Up til 1.0
Iirc it only did the link if the display's mimetype was HTML or Markdowns.
So it can only changed JuPyTer

Up til 1.0
Iirc it only did the link if the display's mimetype was HTML or Markdowns.

text:
Sometimes this hack doesn't even work
```julia> display( MIME("text/html"), @which +(3,3))
+(x::<b>T</b>, y::<b>T</b>)<i> where T<:Union{Int128, Int16, Int32, Int64, Int8, UInt128, UInt16, UInt32, UInt64, UInt8}</i> in Base at <a href="<https://github.com/JuliaLang/julia/tree/539f3ce943f59dec8aff3f2238b083f1b27f41e5/base/int.jl#L86>" target="_blank">int.jl:86</a>```
try `@which rand(3)` for example

elements.text: Sometimes this hack doesn't even work
julia> display( MIME("text/html"), @which +(3,3)) +(x::T, y::T) where T<:Union{Int128, Int16, Int32, Int64, Int8, UInt128, UInt16, UInt32, UInt64, UInt8} in Base at
